data.title: Electric Car Range and Price Comparison 2025 - Coltura
data.content: Electric Car Range and Price Comparison 2025 - Coltura ABOUT About Coltura Our Supporters Identity Our Team OUR WORK Gasoline Superusers Quarterly EV Cost Savings Report Gasoline Expenditures and Swing District Voting Culture Change Policy Change Impact TOOLS Gasoline Consumption Map Gasoline Data Insights EV Savings Calculator EV Adoption Forecaster RESOURCES For Consumers For Activists For Policymakers Gasoline Facts World Gasoline Phaseouts NEWS AND MEDIA Press Coverage Coltura’s News Newsletters Contact ACT NOW Make the Switch to An EV Take Action DONATE TODAY ✕ Electric Car Range and Price Comparison - Updated 2025 INCLUDING the longest range electric car and the cheapest electric car with a 200 and a 300 mile range The average range of EVs has come a long way in the past few years. New EVs go for an average of almost 300 miles on one charge in the US. Some EVs can already travel more on one charge than some gas cars can travel on a tank of gas. For the vast majority of people, the range of EVs is much more than enough for daily commutes . Electric car batteries also can last for hundreds of thousands of miles . There are now almost 70 electric vehicle makes and models available in the US in 2025, from 30 brands - and that number keeps growing. Use this easy to digest list for EV range and price comparison in 2025 . We included the longest range EV available, plus the cheapest 200 mile range EV . Table of Contents 2025 EV Range and Price Comparison The Longest Range Electric Car In 2025 The Cheapest EV With A 200 Mile Range The Cheapest Electric With The Longest Range What Is The Best EV Range For You The Future Of Long Range EVs Thinking About Switching To An EV? Use our EV Cost-Savings Calculator to see how much you could save and our EV Savings Checklist to delve into the many ways driving an EV instead of a gas car could save you money. LEARN ABOUT SWITCHING TO AN EV Electric Car Range Comparison List Before purchasing or leasing an EV, you’ll want to know the maximum range (miles per full charge) of that make and model. Average EV ranges are getting longer every year. 2025 brings even better and more long-range EV options. Most of the range estimates listed here come from a trusted source - the EPA. Ranges are based on a full charge and can be affected by the external environment, vehicle use, vehicle maintenance, battery age and state of health. Notes: Some EVs have options for purchasing extended range. Be sure to check the range of the particular make and model you’re interested in. Some numbers listed here are estimates or unofficial. Check the manufacturer's website for confirmation (linked for each vehicle) and view the EPA range ratings on all new EVs . Prices may or may not include available incentives or tax breaks. Be sure to check what national and local EV incentives for which you may qualify. Looking to Save Money on an EV in 2025? We put together an easy-to-use cheat sheet with some of the best EV resources. It's a must-read for people considering an EV in 2025. Simply enter your email to get the free cheat sheet and receive monthly news and inspiration from our nonprofit. Here are the EVs available in the US in 2025, compared by range and price: Make and model Range Base Price (MSRP) Price Per Mile of Range Vehicle Type Acura ZDX 313 $64,500 $206 SUV Audi S e-tron GT 300 $125,500 $418 Sedan Audi Q4 E-Tron SUV, Sportback 258 $58,200 $226 SUV Audi Q8 e-tron 285 $74,400 $261 SUV BMW i4 eDrive40 318 $57,900 $182 Sedan BMW i5 eDrive40 295 $67,100 $227 Sedan BMW i7 eDrive50 311 $105,700 $340 Sedan BMW iX xDrive50 309 $87,250 $282 SUV Cadillac Lyriq - Single Motor RWD 314 $58,590 $187 SUV Cadillac Escalade IQ* 460 $127,700 $278 SUV (7 seats) Chevrolet Blazer EV - RS RWD 324 $48,800 $151 SUV Chevrolet Equinox FWD 319 $41,100 $105 SUV Chevrolet Silverado EV - LT Extended Range 408 $79,800 $196 Pickup truck Chevrolet Silverado EV - RST Max Range 460 $97,895 $213 Pickup truck Faraday Future FF 91 381 $309,000 $811 SUV Fiat 500e 149 $32,500 $218 Hatchback Fisker Ocean Extreme 360 $61,499 $171 SUV Fisker Ocean Ultra 350 $52,999 $151 SUV Fisker Ocean Sport 231 $38,999 $169 SUV Ford F-150 Lightning Flash 320 $67,995 $212 Pickup truck Ford Mustang Mach-E Premium 300 $39,995 $133 Sedan Genesis Electrified G80 282 $74,375 $264 Sedan Genesis GV60 Standart RWD 294 $52,350 $178 SUV Genesis Electrified GV70 236 $66,950 $284 SUV GMC Hummer EV Pickup 2x 311 $98,845 $318 Pickup truck GMC Hummer EV SUV 303 $98,845 $326 SUV GMC Sierra EV Denali Max Range* 460 $100,495 $218 Pickup truck Honda Prologue EX 296 $47,400 $160 SUV Hyundai Ioniq 5 SE Standard Range 220 $41,800 $190 SUV Hyundai Ioniq 5 SEL RWD 303 $45,850 $151 SUV Hyundai Ioniq 6 SE Standard Range 240 $37,750 $157 Sedan Hyundai Ioniq 6 SE RWD 342 $42,700 $125 Sedan Hyundai Kona Electric SE 200 $32,875 $164 SUV Hyundai Kona Electric SEL 261 $36,875 $141 SUV Jaguar I-Pace 246 $72,500 $295 Crossover Kia EV6 Light RWD 232 $43,975 $190 SUV Kia EV6 Light Lo...

<div class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-vgwnwzup8 one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style=""><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-vgwnwzup8 mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-cccwuijse one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_image vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-cccwuijse mcb-item-image-inner">
<div class="image_frame image_item no_link scale-with-grid element_classes alignright no_border hover-disable mfn-img-box"><div class="image_wrapper "><img class="scale-with-grid mfn-lazy" data-src="/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Grupo-2747.png" alt="Electric Car Range and Price Comparison 2025" title="" width="80" height="" style=""></div></div>
</div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-ah0g29om9 two-third laptop-two-third tablet-two-third mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-ah0g29om9 mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<p>The average range of EVs has come a long way in the past few years.</p>
<p>New EVs go for an average of almost 300 miles on one charge in the US. Some EVs can already travel more on one charge than some gas cars can travel on a tank of gas.</p>
<p>For the vast majority of people, the range of EVs is <a href="https://coltura.org/do-electric-cars-have-enough-range-for-all-of-my-driving-needs-what-if-i-run-out-of-electricity-while-im-on-the-road-and-need-to-charge-my-car-battery/">much more than enough for daily commutes</a>. Electric car batteries also can last for <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-car-battery-life">hundreds of thousands of miles</a>.</p>
<p>There are now almost 70 electric vehicle makes and models available in the US in 2025, from 30 brands - and that number keeps growing.</p>
<p>Use this easy to digest <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-car-battery-range/#ev-range-list">list for EV range and price comparison in 2025</a>.</p>
<p>We included the <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-car-battery-range/#longest-range-ev">longest range EV</a> available, plus the <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-car-battery-range/#cheapest-ev-200-mile-range">cheapest 200 mile range EV</a>.</p>
</div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-qltlicr0h one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_image vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-qltlicr0h mcb-item-image-inner">

<p> </p>
<h3 style="text-align: center;">Thinking About Switching To An EV?</h3>
<p>Use our <a href="https://data.coltura.org/tools/calculator">EV Cost-Savings Calculator</a> to see how much you could save and our <a href="http://www.coltura.org/electric-vehicle-cost-checklist">EV Savings Checklist</a> to delve into the many ways driving an EV instead of a gas car could save you money.</p>
<p></p>
<div class="button_align align_center"><a class="button  button_size_2" href="https://coltura.org/maketheswitch/" style="background-color:#00a99d!important;color:#ffffff;" target="_blank" title=""><span class="button_label">LEARN ABOUT SWITCHING TO AN EV</span></a></div>
</div></div></div>
</div></div></div></section><section class="section mcb-section mfn-default-section mcb-section-fjgnmrqg7  full-width-ex-mobile" id="ev-range-list" style=""><div class="mcb-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="section_wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps mcb-section-inner mcb-section-inner-fjgnmrqg7"><div id="mobile-apps" class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-7icz1jzwp one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style=""><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-7icz1jzwp mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-b3dc62a1d one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-b3dc62a1d mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-h8ysnleky one-second laptop-one-second tablet-one-second mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-h8ysnleky mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>Electric Car Range Comparison List</h2>
<hr>
<p>Before purchasing or leasing an EV, you’ll want to know the maximum range (miles per full charge) of that make and model.</p>
<p>Average EV ranges are getting longer every year. 2025 brings even better and more long-range EV options.</p>
<p>Most of the range estimates listed here come from a trusted source - the EPA.</p>
<p>Ranges are based on a full charge and can be affected by the external environment, vehicle use, vehicle maintenance, battery age and state of health.</p>
<p>Notes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Some EVs have options for purchasing extended range. Be sure to check the range of the particular make and model you’re interested in.</li>
<li class="li1">Some numbers listed here are estimates or unofficial. Check the manufacturer's website for confirmation (linked for each vehicle) and view the <a href="https://www.fueleconomy.gov/feg/PowerSearch.do?action=noform&path=3&year1=2021&year2=2023&vtype=Electric&srchtyp=newAfv&pageno=1&rowLimit=50&sortBy=Comb&tabView=0">EPA range ratings on all new EVs</a>.</li>
<li>Prices may or may not include available incentives or tax breaks. Be sure to check what <a href="https://coltura.org/ev-checklist">national and local EV incentives</a> for which you may qualify.</li>
</ul>
</div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-17fd99959 one-third laptop-one-third tablet-one-third mobile-one column_visual vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-17fd99959 mcb-item-visual-inner"><div class="mfn-visualeditor-content mfn-inline-editor"><div style="background-color: #3f84c5; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); text-align: center;">
<h2 style="color: #ffffff; font-size: 30px; font-weight: bold;">Looking to Save Money on an EV in 2025?</h2>
<p style="color: #ffffff; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6;">We put together an easy-to-use cheat sheet with some of the best EV resources.</p>
<p style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 20px; color: #00a99d; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 5px 10px; border-radius: 5px; display: inline-block; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);">It's a must-read for people considering an EV in 2025.</p>
<p style="color: #ffffff;">Simply enter your email to get the free cheat sheet and receive monthly news and inspiration from our nonprofit.</p>
<div class="mailmunch-forms-widget-1153097" translate="no"> </div>
</div></div></div></div>

<div class="section_wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps mcb-section-inner mcb-section-inner-bx09u4zyv"><div id="free-charging-stations" class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-dzuik9whd one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one column-margin-0px valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style="padding:50px 0"><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-dzuik9whd mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-vb2kl2vkk one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-vb2kl2vkk mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-2oya8f3jg two-third laptop-two-third tablet-two-third mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-2oya8f3jg mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>The Electric Car With The Longest Range In 2025</h2>
<hr>
<p>The longest range electric car is the 2025 <a href="https://lucidmotors.com/air-grand-touring/">Lucid Air Grand Touring sedan</a> with a 512 mile range. The <a href="https://www.chevrolet.com/electric/silverado-ev" data-cmp-ab="2">Chevrolet Silverado EV - RST Max Range</a> ranks second with a 460 miles range - it's a pickup truck. The <a href="https://lucidmotors.com/air-pure" data-cmp-ab="2">Lucid Air Saphire</a> ranks 3rd with a 427 mile range. The <a href="https://rivian.com/r1s" data-cmp-ab="2">Rivian R1S Dual Max Battery</a> is the longest-range SUV at 410 miles, though the untested by the EPA <a href="https://www.cadillac.com/electric/escalade-iq?srsltid=AfmBOoorUcSrX0e0qicoUiT99vhW1XIW-gkVi7ekpuHL3uv6Xm2Z-P_6">Cadillac Escalade IQ</a> claims to have an estimated 460 mile range.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.tesla.com/models">Tesla's Model S</a> is in the top 10 with a 402 mile range and is one of the <a href="https://www.energysage.com/electric-vehicles/most-popular-evs/">most popular EVs in the US</a>.</p>
</div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-jllv9l689 one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-jllv9l689 mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
</div></div></div></section><section class="section mcb-section mfn-default-section mcb-section-qt8hx5p1k  full-width-ex-mobile" id="cheapest-ev-200-mile-range" style=""><div class="mcb-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="section_wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps mcb-section-inner mcb-section-inner-qt8hx5p1k"><div id="mobile-apps" class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-6h3h8as7w one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style=""><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-6h3h8as7w mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-3ca4d05cf one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-3ca4d05cf mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-2ckb4ts6q one-second laptop-one-second tablet-one-second mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-2ckb4ts6q mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>The Cheapest Electric Car with a 200 Mile Range in 2025</h2>
<hr>
<p>The cheapest new EV with over a 200 mile range is the <a href="https://www.hyundaiusa.com/us/en/vehicles/kona-electric" data-cmp-ab="2">Hyundai Kona Electric SE</a> with a range of 200 miles and a list price of $32,875.</p>
<p>If you're looking for more range and qualify for the <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-vehicle-federal-tax-credit/">federal EV tax credit of $7,500</a>, the <a href="https://www.chevrolet.com/electric/equinox-ev" data-cmp-ab="2">Chevrolet Equinox FWD</a> with a 319 mile range would have a base price close to that at $33,600 (MSRP $41,100 minus $7,500) and the 363 mile range <a href="https://www.tesla.com/model3" data-cmp-ab="2">Tesla Model 3 Long Range RWD</a> would start at $34,990 (MSRP $42,490 minus $7,500).</p>
<p>If you’re looking for a new car with a bit more range in the same price neighborhood, you could consider <a href="https://www.hyundaiusa.com/us/en/vehicles/kona-electric">Hyundai Kona Electric</a> which clocks in at a 261 mile range and a list price of $32,675.</p>
<p>The cheapest used EV with greater than a 200 mile range is the Chevy Bolt or Nissan Leaf. You should be able find a used Chevy Bolt or Nissan Leaf in your area for less than $20,000. Search for <a href="https://www.edmunds.com/inventory/srp.html?inventorytype=used%2Ccpo&electricityRange=200-*&engineType=electric&sort=price%3Aasc">inexpensive used EVs with over 200 mile range</a>.</p>
<p>If you're interested in learning more about <a href="https://coltura.org/least-expensive-electric-cars/">the least expensive electric cars in the US</a> check out our guide.</p>
</div></div></div>

</div></div></div></section><section class="section mcb-section mfn-default-section mcb-section-pzzorgxl5  full-width-ex-mobile" id="cheapest-ev-300-mile-range" style="background-color:#ffffff"><div class="mcb-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="section_wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps mcb-section-inner mcb-section-inner-pzzorgxl5"><div id="free-charging-stations" class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-f217q03a4 one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one column-margin-0px valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style="padding:50px 0"><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-f217q03a4 mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-xw3voyrrb one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-xw3voyrrb mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-zuylpotxl one-second laptop-one-second tablet-one-second mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-zuylpotxl mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>The Cheapest Electric Car with The Longest Range</h2>
<hr>
<p>The cheapest new EV in 2025 with over a 300 mile range is the <a href="https://www.ford.com/suvs/mach-e/" data-cmp-ab="2">Ford Mustang Mach-E Premium</a> with exactly 300 miles of range and a list price of $39,995.</p>
<p>However, if you qualify for the <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-vehicle-federal-tax-credit/">federal EV tax credit of $7,500</a>, the <a href="https://www.chevrolet.com/electric/equinox-ev" data-cmp-ab="2">Chevrolet Equinox FWD</a> with a 319 mile range would have a base price of significantly less at $33,600 (MSRP $41,100 minus $7,500) and the 363 mile range <a href="https://www.tesla.com/model3" data-cmp-ab="2">Tesla Model 3 Long Range RWD</a> would start at significantly less at $34,990 (MSRP $42,490 minus $7,500).</p>
<p>The average EV range in the United States is close to 300 miles - there are many other new options available. The list of EVs with more than a 300 mile range includes:</p>
<ul>
<li>The <a href="https://www.nissanusa.com/vehicles/electric-cars/ariya.html" data-cmp-ab="2">Nissan Ariya Venture+ FWD</a> with a 304 mile range and a $41,190 list price</li>
<li>The <a href="https://www.hyundaiusa.com/us/en/vehicles/ioniq-6" data-cmp-ab="2">Hyundai Ioniq 6 SE RWD</a> starting at $42,700 and a 300 mile range</li>
<li>The <a href="https://www.tesla.com/modely" data-cmp-ab="2">Tesla Model Y Long Range RWD</a> has a range of 337. It's list price is $44,990, but if you qualify for the $7,500 federal tax credit it's starting price would be $37,490.</li>
<li>The <a href="https://www.kia.com/us/en/ev6" data-cmp-ab="2">Kia EV6 Light Long Range RWD</a> with its range of 310 starts at $45,950</li>
</ul>
<h3>The Cheapest Used Electric Car with The Longest Range</h3>
<p>The cheapest used EV with a greater than a 300 mile range is a Tesla Model 3. You can likely find a used Tesla in your area for around $25,000. Search for <a href="https://www.edmunds.com/inventory/srp.html?inventorytype=used%2Ccpo&sort=price%3Aasc&engineType=electric&electricityRange=300-*">inexpensive used EVs with at least a 300 mile range</a>. </p>
<p>Learn more about purchasing used electric cars from our nonprofit's free <a href="https://coltura.org/used-electric-cars/">Used Electric Cars Guide</a>.</p>
</div></div></div>

<div class="section_wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps mcb-section-inner mcb-section-inner-m79e2k9f2"><div id="mobile-apps" class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-vhd705jvd one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style=""><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-vhd705jvd mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-a8fc389ee one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-a8fc389ee mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-xx968884y one-second laptop-one-second tablet-one-second mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-xx968884y mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>What is the Best EV Range for You?</h2>
<hr>
<p>This depends on you. The average American drives <a href="https://www.fhwa.dot.gov/ohim/onh00/bar8.htm">37 miles per day</a>. Most charging can be done at home or while you’re at work.</p>
<p>Think first and foremost about your daily commute and secondarily how often you travel long distances.</p>
<p>According to a recent Bloomberg <a href="https://www.spokesman.com/stories/2023/mar/09/us-electric-cars-set-record-with-almost-300-mile-a/#:~:text=In%20a%20survey%20commissioned%20by,for%20200%20miles%20or%20less.">survey</a>, two thirds of respondents indicated that 300-plus miles of range was enough for their needs.</p>
<p>For the times you take a road trip, you will want to plan your roadside charging along the way. Generally, high speed charging is available on main corridors across the country, usually near restaurants or shopping. This will get you an 80% charge in about 30 minutes.</p>
<p>Consider also how long you need to drive in cold weather. Much like the loss of energy efficiency of gasoline-powered vehicles, EV battery range <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/cars/hybrids-evs/how-temperature-affects-electric-vehicle-range-a4873569949/">can drop significantly in cold weather</a>. However, a <a href="https://www.msn.com/en-us/autos/news/new-study-challenges-common-myth-about-electric-cars-these-insights-are-critical/ar-AA1AZ3Eu">2025 report</a> found that electric vehicles remain fully functional in extreme cold, with even the worst-performing models still retaining over 60% of their range and quickly regaining power with a short charge. The best performing models only lost 14% of their range.</p>
<p>Keep in mind you’ll have more range with stop and go driving than out on the open highway, due to the fact that the act of braking regenerates the battery. On the highway, it’s possible to increase your range significantly – even above the EPA rated range – by slowing your speed to around 60 mph. You’ll get very familiar with your EV’s range once you test it out at different speeds and under different terrains and weather conditions.</p>
</div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-1a9ae5df4 one-third laptop-one-third tablet-one-third mobile-one column_image vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-1a9ae5df4 mcb-item-image-inner">

<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-326423dc2 one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-326423dc2 mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-k36vudks7 one-second laptop-one-second tablet-one-second mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-k36vudks7 mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>EV Charging and Range FAQs</h2>
<hr>
<h3>How Far Can I Drive Before I Need To Charge the Battery?</h3>
<p>How far an EV can go before it needs to be charged depends on an electric vehicle’s make and model, the current amount of charge and driving conditions. Read our tips below for getting more range out of an EV’s battery.</p>
<h3>How Can I Find EV Charging Stations?</h3>
<p>Most EV drivers charge at home overnight if/when needed, waking up to a fully charged EV. If you live in an apartment or don’t have off-street parking, you may be able to charge for free at your workplace or other free public chargers. If you do plan to take longer trips, just a little planning will ensure you can find charging stations along the way.</p>
<p>Fast charging “level 3” stations (usually located near markets and restaurants) already enable charging up to 80% full in about 30 minutes, making EV road trips with fueling stops/meal breaks easy.</p>
<p>Battery technology is quickly improving too – <a href="https://time.com/6221619/fast-electric-vehicle-battery-charging-breakthrough/">faster ways to charge your EV</a> are currently being developed.</p>
<p>Also, keep in mind that there are many <a href="https://coltura.org/electric-charging-stations">free places to charge your EV</a>, as well as ways you can <a href="https://coltura.org/nine-ways-evs-can-stay-mobile-during-power-shutoffs-2/">keep your EV going during power shutoffs</a>.</p>
<h3>How Can I Charge My EV at Home?</h3>
<p>EVs can charge anywhere there is a normal 120v outlet – no more going to the gas station. EVs come with a plug that will work in a regular electric outlet, and add about 40 miles of range overnight.</p>
<p>However, you also might want to consider a <a href="https://coltura.org/home-ev-charger-cheat-sheet">level 2 EV charger</a> at your home – this is typically a 240v outlet like the one many people have for their electric clothes dryer. This charger gives about 25 to 40 miles of range per hour. Many EV drivers use a home level 2 charger to top up to a full charge overnight.</p>
<p>About 1/3 of electric car drivers have rooftop solar, so their electricity is coming from sunshine – saving fuel costs as well as the environment. Learn more about <a href="https://cleantechnica.com/2017/06/25/28-40-ev-drivers-solar-panels-cleantechnica-ev-report/">charging your EV with solar panels</a>.</p>
</div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-y97f3orgh one-third laptop-one-third tablet-one-third mobile-one column_visual grey-box vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-y97f3orgh mcb-item-visual-inner"><div class="mfn-visualeditor-content mfn-inline-editor">

<p>We put together this free cheat sheet to help people learn about EV charging and how to purchase the right home charger. Simply enter your email to access the cheat sheet as well as sign up for other EV news and inspiration delivered straight to your inbox.</p>

<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-qlw87hx7g one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-qlw87hx7g mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-o7fheguks one-second laptop-one-second tablet-one-second mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-o7fheguks mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<h2>The Future of Long-Range Electric Cars</h2>
<hr>
<p>Within the decade, EV battery range may approach 800 miles per charge.</p>
<p>Toyota announced plans to release a battery with a <a href="https://cleantechnica.com/2023/07/04/toyota-claims-solid-state-battery-has-745-mile-range-10-minute-charging-time/">range of 745 miles</a> by 2030. It could charge in 10 minutes or less and be easier to manufacture.</p>
<p>The future of longe-range EVs is bright and <a href="https://coltura.org/evbatteries/">EV batteries are already better for the environment than gas-powered cars</a>.</p>
<p>Say goodbye to EV range anxiety and hello to the future of eco-friendly travel.</p>
</div></div></div>

<h5 style="text-align: center;">Do You Want To Learn More About EV Batteries In 2025?</h5>
<p>If you want to learn more about EV batteries or how to get the most out of your EV battery, there are some tips in this guide that can help.</p>
<p>Simply enter your email to access the Ultimate EV Battery Guide For 2025 as well as sign up for other EV news and inspiration from our award-winning nonprofit delivered straight to your inbox.</p>

</div></div></div></section><section class="section mcb-section mfn-default-section mcb-section-kc5kqka92  full-width-ex-mobile bg-cover" style="padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:60px" data-parallax="3d"><img width="1920" height="1080" class="mfn-parallax" src="/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Grupo-2527.png" alt="parallax background" style="opacity:0"><div class="mcb-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="section_wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps mcb-section-inner mcb-section-inner-kc5kqka92">
<div class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-x3w3qqbtn one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style=""><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-x3w3qqbtn mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-7a0616b41 one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-7a0616b41 mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-gfv89248i two-third laptop-two-third tablet-two-third mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-gfv89248i mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix align_center" style=""><h2><b><img width="134" height="63" style="width: 70px; align: right; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 20px;" src="/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Grupo-2659.png">Conclusion</b></h2></div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-b64j6g6fh one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-b64j6g6fh mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-q32ywqarv one-sixth laptop-one-sixth tablet-one-sixth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-q32ywqarv mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-assgimkab two-third laptop-two-third tablet-two-third mobile-one column_column vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-assgimkab mcb-item-column-inner"><div class="column_attr mfn-inline-editor clearfix" style="">
<p>Electric vehicles have evolved rapidly. The development of lithium-ion batteries has allowed vehicles to go hundreds of miles on a single charge.</p>
<p>Hundreds of miles is already much more than enough for most people’s daily commutes. Eco-friendly traveling with an EV is easier as well.</p>
<p>Now you have more info about the ranges of the many EVs available and about maximizing your EV battery’s potential even further.</p>
<p>Driving an EV will only continue to improve.</p>
</div></div></div>
</div></div>
<div class="wrap mcb-wrap mcb-wrap-8ojdw0q04 one tablet-one laptop-one mobile-one white-box valign-top vb-item clearfix" data-desktop-col="one" data-laptop-col="laptop-one" data-tablet-col="tablet-one" data-mobile-col="mobile-one" style="padding:30px 0 0 0"><div class="mcb-wrap-inner mcb-wrap-inner-8ojdw0q04 mfn-module-wrapper mfn-wrapper-for-wraps">
<div class="mcb-wrap-background-overlay"></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-rsc80tp7x one-fifth laptop-one-fifth tablet-one-fifth mobile-one column_placeholder vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-rsc80tp7x mcb-item-placeholder-inner"><div class="placeholder"> </div></div></div>
<div class="column mcb-column mcb-item-bwg76pvdy three-fifth laptop-three-fifth tablet-three-fifth mobile-one column_visual yep vb-item" style=""><div class="mcb-column-inner mfn-module-wrapper mcb-column-inner-bwg76pvdy mcb-item-visual-inner"><div class="mfn-visualeditor-content mfn-inline-editor">
<h3>Do You Want Less Vehicle Pollution?</h3>
<p>So do we.</p>
<p>Our nonprofit is laser-focused on reducing gasoline use as quickly as possible.</p>
<p>We invite you to consider supporting our efforts to move the country beyond gasoline.</p>
<p>Take the next step! Sign up to get electric vehicle news, inspiration and info about political action from Coltura, a nonprofit fighting to move beyond gasoline to cleaner alternatives like EVs.</p>
<div class="mailmunch-forms-widget-1127614" translate="no"> </div>

          $(map.overlay).removeClass('showform2').addClass('hideform2');

        }
      }
    });
  });
